text: 15.16 Mat 28.19, Mak 16.15, Jon 6.70, 14.13, 1 Jo 4.10, 4.19 Nɨbi yɨp dun agɨl ma dɨpek, yad nɨbop aglɨl din agɨl dɨnek agak. Mɨdup pulɨl pelpel yenɨgab ak pulɨnɨgel agɨl, nɨbop tɨg asɨk ke lɨl, wog anɨb ak agyokɨnek agak. Anɨb ak nɨbi Jisas binɨb ne mɨdobun agɨl, Bapi nop tap tɨtay agnɨgenɨgabɨm, agɨnɨgabɨm tek nɨbop ñɨnɨgab agak.
